scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hash-graph-migrations --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
scripts.start:migrate:down: cargo run --package hash-graph-migrations --bin cli --features cli -- run --user postgres --password postgres --target 0
scripts.start:migrate:up: cargo run --package hash-graph-migrations --bin cli --features cli -- run --user postgres --password postgres
